name: Secrets of the Earth
description:
• Become the new Indiana Jones in our exciting game SECRETS OF THE EARTH.
  • Compete with friends who will find more treasure or will clean more landmines.
  • Check your luck by finding all the rare amulets.
  • Explore ruins of Ancient Rome and Egypt, Europe and the Wild West. 
  • You will also search for amber nuggets in the minefield!
